name: Beastly Corrosion
description: When there is Golden Wolflord on the field who has this card equipped, your opponent's Golden Corrosion can stack up to 5 times. This will affect them even if they are on the field.
descriptionraw: When there is $[A2603] on the field who has this card equipped, your opponent's <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126031]</color> can stack up to 5 times. This will affect them even if they are on the field.
descriptionreplaced: When there is Golden Wolflord on the field who has this card equipped, your opponent's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Golden Corrosion</color> can stack up to 5 times. This will affect them even if they are on the field.
